snippet: The judge in the trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, accused in the Boston Marathon bombing case, has questioned prospective jurors, looking for bias.
abstract: Prospective juror in Boston Marathon bombing case against suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev becomes emotional under questioning.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, accused in the Boston Marathon bombing case, has questioned prospective jurors, looking for bias.

headline.main: Jury Selection for Tsarnaev Trial in Boston Sees Emotions Come to Fore
headline.print_headline: Emotions Come to Fore in Boston Jury Selection
